3187.bart_summary: The SRU have clinched the biggest shirt sponsorship deal in their history after agreeing a £3.6million contract over three years with BT. Sportsmail exclusively revealed last year that BT had agreed to pay £20m over four years for the naming rights of Murrayfield. Now that has come to fruition and, come the summer, they will take over from ousted backers RBS.

3189.bart_summary: Michael Phelps won 100m butterfly at Arena Pro Swim Series in Arizona. Phelps won the race in Mesa with a time of 52.38 seconds. The 18-time Olympic gold-medallist was suspended by USA Swimming for failing a drink-driving test last September. 29-year-old Phelps is aiming to compete in a fifth Olympics next year in Rio de Janeiro.

Olympic silver medalist won in 2 minutes, 5.05 near Cape Town .
Injury-hit Semenya is aiming to qualify for the World Championships .

3190.bart_summary: Caster Semenya reclaimed the South African 800-meter title on Saturday. The former 800 world title-holder and 2012 Olympic silver medalist won in 2 minutes, 5.05 seconds in Stellenbosch, near Cape Town. Her winning time was just over four seconds off the qualifying mark for the Worlds in Beijing in August.

3191.highlights:
Arsenal Under-21s fell to a 3-2 defeat at Middlesbrough on Monday night .
The Gunners had goalkeeper Deyan Iliev sent off early on .
He had brought down Harry Chapman in the box and a penalty was given .
Emmanuel Ledesma scored from the spot before Alex Iwobi equalised .
Boro scored two first-half screamers to lead 3-1 through Lewis Maloney and Yanic Wildschut before Daniel Crowley scored on the hour mark .

Emmanuel Ledesma converted the resulting penalty past Matt Macey. Boro built up a two-goal lead before half-time through screamers from Lewis Maloney and Yanic Wildschut.

And Hales said it is still his 'dream' to play Test cricket for England .

3193.bart_summary: Alex Hales scored his first double hundred for Nottinghamshire on Sunday. Hales was unbeaten on 222 not out at stumps on the opening day of the LV= County Championship match against Yorkshire at Trent Bridge. The England international shared a third wicket stand of 171 with James Taylor, who scored 59. Steven Patterson and Jack Brooks took two for 58 and 90 respectively.

3196.bart_summary: Liam Phillips won the 2013 BMX world title and was the World Cup series champion in 2014. The 26-year-old plans to use 2015 to experiment with tactics in a bid to arrive at the start gate in Rio full of confidence. Phillips leads a five-rider British team, which also features Tre Whyte, Kyle Evans and Quillan Isidore.

3197.bart_summary: Taekwondo fighter Aaron Cook's application to switch allegiances to Moldova has been approved by the British Olympic Association. The 24-year-old applied for citizenship earlier this month after receiving funding from Moldovan billionaire Igor Iuzefovici. British Olympic chief Bill Sweeney insists the association worked'really hard' to keep Cook on board.

The Magpies have lost their last six consecutive league games .
Thousands of supporters boycotted the last defeat by Spurs on Sunday .

3198.bart_summary: Thousands of Newcastle fans boycotted the club's last game, a 3-1 defeat at home to Spurs on Sunday. Mark Jensen, editor of online fanzine www.themag.co.uk, fears longer-term consequences. Jensen: 'I feel sorry for young people, what they are watching now and this lack of ambition. At least when I was young, the team might have been rubbish and we were going nowhere, but it was exciting to be on the terraces'
